techmeme.title: Disney says Hulu will replace the Star hub on Disney+ on October 8 in international markets as part of Disney's plan to expand Hulu globally (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
Extortion group Crimson Collective claims to have breached Red Hat's private GitHub repositories, stealing ~570GB from 28K projects; Red Hat confirms a breach (Lawrence Abrams/BleepingComputer)
Oneleet, an integrated compliance service combining penetration testing, code scanning, and more, raised a $33M Series A led by Dawn Capital and hits $3M ARR (Dominic-Madori Davis/TechCrunch)
Asahi says most of its 30 factories in Japan have not operated since September 29 after a cyberattack, leaving Japan with just days of Asahi Super Dry stock (Financial Times)
Sources: German AI language platform DeepL held initial talks over a US IPO, and may seek an up to $5B valuation; DeepL raised $300M at a $2B valuation in 2024 (Bloomberg)
